Marcus.name: Marcus

physical_description.details: 15-year-old boy, has binding mark on palm (circle bisected by three wavy lines)

personality: Drawn to mystery despite common sense

relationships.mother: Working single parent, diner shift worker, will be frantic about his disappearance
relationships.father: Dead in car accident last year, likely had resonance/connection to the other world
relationships.Kira: Mender who is helping him survive the Binding

goals: Figure out why he's called 'the key'
Learn to control magic without dying
Find a way to contact his mother
Understand what the Weavers want from him

current_state.magic: Has channels opened but no training, dangerous to use

arc_notes: Recently moved to Vermont - doesn't fit in
Touched magical chest and transported to another world
Called 'the key' by mysterious cloaked beings (Weavers)
Survived the Binding ritual (30% fail rate)
Marked permanently with magic channels
Has ancestral connection to this world through bloodline resonance
Received vision of ancient war and the Veil being raised
Portal home is sealed - cannot return to Vermont
Must stop the Veil from breaking or die trying

Kira Shen.name: Kira Shen

physical_description.details: Dark skin, hair twisted into dozens of small braids with beads, solid gold eyes (no white visible), has binding mark on collarbone

relationships.Marcus: Caring for him post-Binding, teaching him basics
relationships.The Weavers: Serves them as a Mender, but sees herself and others as 'tools'

goals: Keep Marcus alive through the Binding recovery
Serve as a Mender for the Weavers
arc_notes: Is a Mender - fixes people the Weavers break
Crossed between worlds voluntarily (unlike Marcus)
Has her own binding mark from crossing worlds
Knows about the pattern the Weavers serve
Warns that untrained magic use is deadly

The Weavers.name: The Weavers

physical_description.details: Tall, slender, wrapped in twilight-like cloaks, faceless (void where face should be but they do have faces humans can't see), pale hands with 6-7 fingers that blur when observed

relationships.Marcus: Call him 'the key', performed Binding on him, expect him to help stop the war
relationships.Kira: She serves them as a Mender

goals: Prevent the return of the ancient war
arc_notes: Can communicate telepathically
Move in synchronized patterns to drum beats
Have green fire on their ritual platforms
Perform dangerous Binding rituals with 30% failure rate
Can share visions by touching foreheads
Showed Marcus vision of ancient war between light/shadow beings
Told Marcus: 'You will learn. Or you will die. Either serves the pattern.'
